Q_NAME: Perfect numbers within a specified range
Q_DESC:
George was interested in finding a perfect number. His Teacher told that a perfect number is a positive integer that is equal to the sum of its proper positive divisors excluding the number itself. Equivalently, a perfect number is a number that is half  the sum of all its positive divisors. Guide George in writing a code to find the perfect numbers within a specified range.
Input:
System should read a starting range and the ending range. 1N10000. N-range
Output:
Display the perfect numbers present within this range. if there is no perfect number present within the range display a message that there is no perfect number present within this range.
